reviewText: As a submariner i'd been looking for this for years. Recieved in great condition and already watched it twice.

great dvd!  Filled with little known but extremely interesting information regarding the Submarine services during the cold war.  A real eye opener.  After viewing it I have nothing but admiration for the men who form the "silent service".  I loaned it to several of my friends and have thus far been unable to retrieve it such is its popularity.  I highly recommend "blind Man's Bluff" in either book or dvd format.
